headings: Be a kind & respectful internet user
paragraphs: I respect each other for their rights in expressing themselves via internet. I will be very careful in sharing images and messages with others online. Internet should not be served as a platform for embarrassing, hurting and harassing others.
I will think twice before I post. I will protect my personal privacy including address, contact phone number and identification number address and disclose these information to those I trust.
I will manage the time on using internet properly and smartly. A daily time limit will be set for using screen devices if necessary.

If I see something receive something from the web which make me feel uncomfortable, I will ignore those messages, share with my parents or other trusted adult, and report the incident to the authority concerned when necessary.
